dt: {bc}coming from another source and not inherent or innate

dt.t: a Federal house without {wi}adventitious{/wi} later additions

dt: {bc}arising or occurring sporadically or in other than the usual location

et: borrowed from Latin {it}adventīcius{/it} "coming from outside, external, foreign," from {it}adventus{/it}, past participle of {it}advenīre{/it} "to arrive, approach" + {it}-īcius{/it} {et_link|-itious|-itious} {ma}{mat|advent|}{/ma}

arising or occurring sporadically or in other than the usual location
